languages.text: "Мое почтение, генерал-лейтенант. {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Астра Милитарум{/g} — молот Бога-Императора, так ведь говорят? Что ж, судьба наверняка позволит вам сполна проявить свои полководческие таланты". {n}Кунрад тонко улыбается — то ли вам, то ли своим мыслям.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Мое почтение, генерал-лейтенант. Астра Милитарум — молот Бога-Императора, так ведь говорят? Что ж, судьба наверняка позволит вам сполна проявить свои полководческие таланты". {n}Кунрад тонко улыбается — то ли вам, то ли своим мыслям.{/n}

languages.text: "My regards, Lieutenant General. The {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} is the hammer of the God-Emperor, isn't that what they say? Well, it is likely that fate will give you ample opportunity to demonstrate your talents as a commander." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мое почтение, генерал-лейтенант. {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Астра Милитарум{/g} — молот Бога-Императора, так ведь говорят? Что ж, судьба наверняка позволит вам сполна проявить свои полководческие таланты". {n}Кунрад тонко улыбается — то ли вам, то ли своим мыслям.{/n}

Well, it is likely that fate will give you ample opportunities to demonstrate your talents as a commander." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly — either at you or to himself.{/n}

Well, it is likely that fate will give you ample opportunity to demonstrate your talents as a commander." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

languages.text: “向您致意，中将。{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}星界军{/g}是神皇之锤，大家都是这么说的，没错吧？既然如此，那很可能是命运赐予了您充分的机会，让您得以展露指挥方面的才华。”{n}维特威尔微微一笑，但你不太确定这个笑容是不是对你露出来的。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, Lieutenant General. The {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} is the hammer of the God-Emperor, isn't that what they say? Well, it is likely that fate will give you ample opportunity to demonstrate your talents as a commander." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “向您致意，中将。{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}星界军{/g}是神皇之锤，大家都是这么说的，没错吧？既然如此，那很可能是命运赐予了您充分的机会，让您得以展露指挥方面的才华。”{n}维特威尔微微一笑，但你不太确定这个笑容是不是对你露出来的。{/n}

languages.text: «Saludos, teniente general. El {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} es el martillo del Dios Emperador, como suelen decir. Bueno, es probable que el destino le ofrezca multitud de oportunidades de demostrar sus talentos como comandante». {n}Voigtvir esboza una sonrisa débil, pero no sabes si está dirigida a ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, Lieutenant General. The {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} is the hammer of the God-Emperor, isn't that what they say? Well, it is likely that fate will give you ample opportunity to demonstrate your talents as a commander." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Saludos, teniente general. El {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} es el martillo del Dios Emperador, como suelen decir. Bueno, es probable que el destino le ofrezca multitud de oportunidades de demostrar sus talentos como comandante». {n}Voigtvir esboza una sonrisa débil, pero no sabes si está dirigida a ti.{/n}

languages.text: 「よろしくお願いします、総督副官殿。{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国防衛軍{/g}は神帝陛下の鉄槌と言われますね。まあ、運命の巡り合わせで指揮官としての貴殿の才能を発揮する機会は十分にあるでしょう」{n}ボイトヴィルはかすかに微笑んだが、それが自分に向けられたものなのか、あなたにはわからない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, Lieutenant General. The {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} is the hammer of the God-Emperor, isn't that what they say? Well, it is likely that fate will give you ample opportunity to demonstrate your talents as a commander." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「よろしくお願いします、総督副官。{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国防衛軍{/g}は神帝陛下の鉄槌と言われますね。まあ、運命の巡り合わせで指揮官としての貴殿の才能を発揮する機会は十分にあるでしょう」{n}ボイドヴィルは、かすかに微笑んだが、それが自分に向けられたものなのか、あなたにはわからない。{/n}
「よろしくお願いします、総督副官殿。{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国防衛軍{/g}は神帝陛下の鉄槌と言われますね。まあ、運命の巡り合わせで指揮官としての貴殿の才能を発揮する機会は十分にあるでしょう」{n}ボイトヴィルはかすかに微笑んだが、それが自分に向けられたものなのか、あなたにはわからない。{/n}

languages.original_text: "My regards, Lieutenant General. The Astra Militarum is the hammer of the God-Emperor, isn't that what they say? Well, it is likely that fate will give you ample opportunity to demonstrate your talents as a commander." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

languages.text: « Mes hommages, {mf|lieutenant-général|lieutenante-générale}. Ne dit-on pas que l'{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} est le marteau de l'Empereur-Dieu ? Eh bien, il est fort probable que le destin vous offre moult opportunités de faire la preuve de vos talents de {mf|commandant|commandante}. » {n}Voigtvir esquisse un faible sourire, mais vous n'êtes pas {mf|sûr|sûre} qu'il vous est destiné.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, Lieutenant General. The {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} is the hammer of the God-Emperor, isn't that what they say? Well, it is likely that fate will give you ample opportunity to demonstrate your talents as a commander." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mes hommages, {mf|lieutenant-général|lieutenante-générale}. Ne dit-on pas que l'{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} est le marteau de l'Empereur-Dieu ? Eh bien, il est fort probable que le destin vous offre moult opportunités de faire la preuve de vos talents de {mf|commandant|commandante}. » {n}Voigtvir esquisse un faible sourire, mais vous n'êtes pas {mf|sûr|sûre} qu'il vous est destiné.{/n}

languages.text: "Sehr erfreut, Lieutenant-General. Das {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} ist der Hammer des Gottimperators, sagt man nicht so? Nun, wahrscheinlich wird Euch das Schicksal ausreichend Gelegenheit gewähren, um Eure Talente als Commander zu demonstrieren." {n}Voigtvir lächelt schmal, aber du bist nicht sicher, ob es dir gilt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, Lieutenant General. The {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} is the hammer of the God-Emperor, isn't that what they say? Well, it is likely that fate will give you ample opportunity to demonstrate your talents as a commander." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sehr erfreut, Lieutenant-General. Das {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} ist der Hammer des Gottimperators, sagt man nicht so? Nun, wahrscheinlich wird Euch das Schicksal ausreichend Gelegenheit gewähren, um Eure Talente als Commander zu demonstrieren." {n}Voigtvir lächelt schmal, aber du bist nicht sicher, ob es dir gilt.{/n}

languages.text: "Saygılarımı sunarım Korgeneral. {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum'dan{/g} Tanrı İmparator'un çekici olarak bahsederler, haksız mıyım? Kader size bir komutan olarak hünerlerinizi bolca sergileme imkânı sunmuştur şüphesiz." {n}Voigtvir belli belirsiz gülümsese de sana mı yönelttiğinden emin olamıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, Lieutenant General. The {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} is the hammer of the God-Emperor, isn't that what they say? Well, it is likely that fate will give you ample opportunity to demonstrate your talents as a commander." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Saygılarımı sunarım Korgeneral. {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}'dan Tanrı İmparator'un çekici olarak bahsederler, haksız mıyım? Kader size bir komutan olarak hünerlerinizi bolca sergileme imkânı sunmuştur şüphesiz." {n}Voigtvir belli belirsiz gülümsese de sana mı yönelttiğinden emin olamıyorsun.{/n}
